text: Hi, I am struggling to work out the syntax to pass Hubl Syntax such as a Text into a Hubdb param.
Where the REXID1 is defined in the editor and then the query is run when populated as a param.
Nothing I do will validate in the editor.

Taking a stab here as I'm not _usually_ working with HubL tags...The HubL tag (`text`) that you're using outputs more than just the text that is entered in that field within the editor. See the example output from a text field here - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags#text>
As such, you'll need to add a bit to where you reference that tag, so that it only renders the inner text, and not the full markup:
```{% text "REXID1" %}
{% set queryparams = queryparams ~ "&prop_type=Auction&prop_agent_id="~ widget_data.REXID1.body.value %}```

<@UEKMY50SU> It must be manually? Is not it automatic?
Thank you for answer.
